extension.description: [COLOR blue]Rogue Radio a general mix of radio stations[/COLOR]
Browse, stream or download your favourite songs and albums

This Wizard allows you to install the latest version of [B][COLOR orange]Team Illuminati[/COLOR][/B] builds as well as builds from other builders in the Community. It also provides Maintenance, Tools and Tweaks sections to help you keep your Media Center running as smoothly as possible.

extension.news: 6.2.0 [add] Context menu -> 'Play with subtitles' |contrib: solarus| [add] Option to download subtitles before playback in Settings -> General -> Configure subtitles [add] 'Settings -> Advanced -> Use YouTube website urls' for external/alternative players eg. Player: MPC-BE, URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C0NyvxTJGcQ [fix] Mark as watched in Kodi 18 [fix] Reported background progress dialog percentage [fix] Playlist items, use video_items instead of playback_items [upd] Improve speed of playback starting and resolver before: min: 1.5s max: 2.6s median: 1.7s after: min: 0.9s max: 2.6s median: 1.2s [chg] refactor logging and system version [chg] Localize confirmation [lang] es_es strings |contrib: roliverosc|
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is not endorsed by Google
extension.description: YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
extension.disclaimer: Este add-on no está respaldado por Google
extension.description: YouTube - популярнейший видеохостинговый сайт, предоставляющий пользователям услуги хранения, доставки и показа видео.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.

extension.disclaimer: 此附加元件未由Google支持

extension.description: Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)

Plexus - Una estructura compleja conteniendo una intrincada red de partes. Plexus añade soporte nativo peer-to-peer (AceStream y SopCast) al Centro de Entretenimiento Kodi para varias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentacion: (falta)
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host nor distribute any of the content you may watch using this addon. The author has no part in the development of any included technologies. When seeking help in Kodi's forum please respect rules (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

Se procurar ajuda no fórum oficial do Kodi por favor respeite as regras do fórum (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

extension.summary: Collection of modules used by Mucky Ducks Addons
extension.description: Collection of modules used by Mucky Ducks Addons beautifulsoup3 v3.2.1 from https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup : beautifulsoup4 v4.5.1 from https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup : cfscrape 1.6.8 from https://github.com/Anorov/cloudflare-scrape : incapsula-cracker v0.1.3 from https://github.com/ziplokk1/incapsula-cracker : Js2Py v0.40 from https://github.com/PiotrDabkowski/Js2Py : jsbeautifier v1.6.4 from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/jsbeautifier : jsunfuck from tknorrois s.a.l.t.s modules: jsunpack from urlresolver which is a modified script from jsbeautifier: md_request a simple script for making web requests : md_tools a script with common methods in the Mucky Duck addons : md_view a simple script for adding views to addons : requests v2.12.4 from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests : six v1.10.0 from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/six : unshortenit v0.3.0 from https://github.com/jkehler/unshortenit :
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
